Text:
DON'T DOWNLOAD!

There's something wrong with this file. I downloaded it twice and all it would do is bounce in the Dock until I force quit it.

I downloaded it from the App Store and it works fine (it's FREE!).

DON'T DOWNLOAD!

There's something wrong with this file. I downloaded it twice and all it would do is bounce in the Dock until I force quit it.

I downloaded it from the App Store and it works fine (IT'S FREE!).
Damn, I kept trying to submit my comment because nothing was happening - I even logged out then back in. Now it shows up twice.

Here's the link to the App Store: 
http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/blackmagic-disk-speed-test/id425264550?mt=12

It's always a good idea to NOT download anything from here that you can freely get from the original website or places like the app store. Not saying anything against the uploader here, but a.) why the fuck would you up anything that's free anyway and b.) god know what could have been done with the code.
